body: XanderRaidon. umm .Skimmed through the pixs but if  that was his objective then it feels like self flagellation and lying to himself..You only hurt the two parties when they have something which reminded u of something which u held dear and couldnt get it for you.
如果一开始就阻断，不会是这样的结局

By far the dumbest villain I've ever seen. He tried to break their relationship by putting them BOTH through the same hardship. If people go through the same hardship, their bond will always become stronger. The way to separate people is to make them believe they've been betrayed. Not to mention that this guy was dumb enough to suicide. But I just can't realize why he wanted to break them up in the first place.
What a way to end this. The older sister didn't get DPd though, or TPd, so no.

Seeing him die like I called back on chapter 1 was satisfying. Seeing how the artist went for the fucked-up yuri end was satisfying. The story has a lot of things I dislike in it, but at least it tries to tell a story (look at all those black butterflies), unlike 90% of works with the same themes.

His motivation was actually to see if the two would still love eachother after he tried to tear them apart. At the end, they do, even though they're both enormous perverts now, so he says it's time to stop interfering and eats the traffic.
